snippet: It was the first time that an American secretary of state had visited Somalia and came against a backdrop of recurrent attacks by Shabab militants.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry stops in Somalia for brief but symbolic visit with Pres Hassan Sheikh Mohamud and Prime Min Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke.
lead_paragraph: It was the first time that an American secretary of state had visited Somalia and came against a backdrop of recurrent attacks by Shabab militants.

headline.main: John Kerry Makes Unannounced Visit to Somalia
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Somalia: Kerry Meets With Officials
